resources.string:
"DISCLAIMER : 

USE DDKEYS AT YOUR OWN RISK.

			I, the developer of ddKeys, will not take any responsbilities for any consequences whatsoever which may result from using this app or any related actions."

"Greetings fellow DRPG player! \n Thank you for choosing ddKeys. I hope it will serve you well on your many adventures just as it has helped me and my friends. Take time to review everything (especially the disclaimer) which I have included here, for you to be informed. \n With that being said, goodluck out there and have fun!"

"1. Will I get banned for using this app? 
A: Nope. But if you use this keyboard just to spam on continuously without minding cooldown - YES, there is a chance. 
[Note that the timers in ddkeys are optional. They may reset if app crashes or if you clear cache. IDK] 
 
2. Is it authorised by DiscordRPG developers ? 
A: No. Before using the app in-game, it is very important for you to validate all buttons by yourself. No one else (even I) take any responsibility for whatever issue you encounter by using this app. 
 
3. Why can't I press the sides button twice ? 
A: The sides button and travel buttons are disabled when their respective timer runs. You can stop the timer and re-enable the keys back by tapping the reset button on ddkeys icon (hold on to view popupkeys). 
[ Note: For sides, you can send the command by a long press which doesn't mind cooldown timer ] 
 
4. I'm in a different location; how do I change location using ddKeys? 
A: You can switch locations in ddKeys just by holding the location keys, which will not send a command 
 
5. Some additional features that may help you described in "Into to ddKeys" docs




End…"
Input the prefix you prefer to use in ddKeys.
Set custom commands of your choice [exclusive prefix].
Set the minimum number of adventures you take to heal.\n\nSuggest to use "Aldebaran" bot for better results.
Sides timer will show on keyboard
This will trigger below selected command(s)
This will trigger commands to switch xprate between 0% and 100%
This will trigger each sides command (no cooldown)
Sides timer will not show on keyboard
Not assigned anything on long press
Not assigned anything on long press
Not assigned anything on long press
Will not shows adventure counts on keyboard
"To effect these modification restart keyboard by swapping with other keyboard"
